overview: Wade Nembhard is an American entrepreneur, author, and motivational speaker. Originally from Jamaica in the Carribean, he grew up in the United States to become founder of Little Blue Box, LLC. He also founded EntrepreneurRookie business portal to help startup businesses and new entrepreneurs. Wade also co-authored a series of success books for young entrepreneurs. He mentors young people in the ways of success and entrepreneurship, and also does motivational speaking on occasions.

external_links.title: Wade Nembhard,  From Caribbean Kid to Young American Entrepreneur
